title: Client not responding a lot (even after repairing)
body:
This started happening more often after I got the Alpha Client Beta testing. I don't know what else to say other than it goes not responding randomly.
I am NOT running the client as administrator (when I do there is no more crashes), as I have standard account privileges for security's sake. I have the admin password when I need it.

Is there a way to get League always run as administrator without typing in the password every time. Will the new Alpha Client not require to run as administrator?

replies.body: The patcher requires permission to access files and launch.  Since running as admin resolves this, your OS settings may need to be changed around to grant access.  Our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide has a list of steps which should get you squared away.  Let me know if you have anymore issues after!

ALSO: Should I do this with the Alpha Client as well or keep it the same way?
I'm glad to hear everything is okay now!  It's fine to leave things as it is at this point, unless you begin to have issues there too.
